description:
Use your webOS phone to chat with the crew of the starship Enterprise, investigate strange new worlds and new applications, eliminate your enemies and medicate your crew mates.

Features:
Communicator - Communicate with the crew of the Enterprise or other notable characters. Features over 600 audio clips!
Phaser - Protect your away team from hostile inhabitants!  Multiple settings including phaser overload!
Tricorder - Select your away teams musical accompaniment. View planet surfaces and find other Star Trek applications!
Medical Scanner - Diagnose your away teams medical conditions before they become serious issues!

By far one of the nerdiest applications in the entire catalog and the best Star Trek Communicator on any mobile platform.
